title: Authentication: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials, receiving a session cookie and access to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit the login form
Verify login success, user is redirected to dashboard
Verify HttpOnly session cookie is set
Verify CSRF token is provided and valid

title: Authentication: Failed Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Submit login form
Verify login failure notification is displayed
Verify no session cookie is set

title: Authentication: Session Management and Logout
description: Verify that session persists across navigation and logout properly clears the session.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Navigate between multiple protected pages
Verify user remains authenticated and pages load successfully
Perform logout action
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page
Verify session cookies and CSRF tokens are cleared

title: User Management: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that user roles properly restrict access to features and pages according to assigned permissions.

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Verify full access to user management CRUD operations
Log in as manager user
Verify restricted access as per role (e.g., cannot delete users)
Log in as volunteer or member user
Verify access only to allowed features, e.g., no user management access
Attempt unauthorized access via URL manipulation
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown error

title: Beneficiary Management: CRUD Operations
description: Test full CRUD workflow for beneficiary records including create, view, edit, delete, search, filter, and export.

steps.description: Navigate to beneficiary list view
Use quick-add modal to add new beneficiary with valid data
Verify beneficiary appears in list and details are correct
Filter and search beneficiaries by multiple criteria
Verify filtered and searched results are accurate
Open beneficiary detail page and edit data with valid inputs
Verify changes are saved and reflected correctly
Delete beneficiary record
Verify record is removed from the list
Export beneficiary list to CSV, Excel, and PDF formats
Verify exported files are correctly formatted and complete

title: Beneficiary Management: Input Validation and Sanitization
description: Verify that beneficiary forms validate inputs correctly using Zod schema and protect against XSS/SQL injection.

steps.description: Open beneficiary creation form
Input invalid or malicious data (e.g., script tags, SQL commands) in fields
Submit the form
Verify validation errors are shown for invalid inputs
Verify submission is rejected or sanitized
Repeat above with edge case data (max length strings, unicode characters)
Verify form validation and sanitization behave correctly

title: Donations Management: Tracking, Receipt, and Reporting
description: Verify that donation entries can be made, receipts generated, and reports reflecting data are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to donation list view
Submit a new donation via the donation form with valid data
Verify new donation appears in the list
Generate and view receipt for a donation
Verify receipt contains correct details and is downloadable
Navigate to donations report page
Verify reports reflect donation data accurately
Test piggy bank feature for collection tracking
Verify piggy bank updates correctly with donations

title: Aid Application Processing and Approval Workflow
description: Test complete aid application workflow including submission, status tracking, and approval/rejection processes.

steps.description: Open aid application form and submit with valid data
Verify application entry is created and visible in list
Update application status through approval workflow
Verify status updates are recorded and displayed correctly
Test rejection and other status transitions
Verify workflows enforce allowed transitions and unauthorized edits are prevented

title: Tasks Management: Kanban Board Operations and Drag-and-Drop
description: Verify task creation, editing, assignment, status updates, and drag-and-drop reordering work as expected on Kanban board.

steps.description: Navigate to tasks Kanban board
Create a new task with valid data
Verify new task appears in backlog column
Assign the task to a user and update priority
Verify task assignment and details update correctly
Drag task from backlog to in-progress column
Verify task status updates appropriately
Test invalid drag-and-drop operations to prohibited columns
Verify invalid operations are prevented or reverted
Delete a task and verify removal
Task no longer appears on board

title: Meetings Management: Scheduling and Calendar Visualization
description: Verify meeting creation, editing, and calendar view rendering perform correctly with valid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to meetings management page
Create a meeting via meeting form with valid data including date/time
Verify meeting appears in meeting list and calendar view
Edit meeting details and save
Verify updates are reflected on calendar and meeting detail
Change meeting status and confirm it updates on UI
Verify status change is correctly shown and persisted
Attempt to schedule meeting with invalid or overlapping time
Verify validation error is shown and meeting is not saved

title: Internal Messaging: Template and Bulk Message Sending
description: Verify users can select message templates, select recipients individually or in bulk, compose message, and send successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to internal messaging page
Select a pre-defined message template
Select multiple recipients from recipient selector
Compose additional message content if needed
Send the message
Verify message is sent successfully with confirmation
Verify messages are logged or visible in message history
Attempt to send message with no recipients
Verify validation error prevents sending

title: Dashboard: Data Accuracy and Key Metrics Display
description: Verify the dashboard provides accurate system overview including statistics cards, recent activities, and quick access links.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to main dashboard
Verify key statistics cards show current and accurate data
Verify recent activity logs match latest system events
Verify quick access links navigate correctly to relevant modules

title: Financial Dashboard: Income and Expense Tracking with Reporting
description: Verify financial dashboard accurately displays income/expense data and generates detailed reports.

steps.description: Open financial dashboard and income/expense monitoring pages
Verify data is accurate and up-to-date
Generate financial reports and download
Verify reports reflect input data correctly and format is correct

title: Scholarship Management: Student and Application Handling
description: Verify managing student records, scholarship applications, and orphan sponsorships with full CRUD and status workflows.

steps.description: Navigate to scholarship management module
Create new student record and verify in list
Submit new scholarship application and verify status
Update orphan sponsorship records
Verify correctness and persistence of all changes
Test invalid input and verify validation errors for scholarship forms
Verify input validations and error feedback

title: Settings Management: Configuration Update and Validation
description: Verify system settings can be updated via the settings page with appropriate validation and persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to settings management page
Modify system parameters with valid values
Submit the changes
Verify settings update is saved and effective
Attempt to enter invalid configuration values
Verify validation errors prevent submission

title: Data Table Component: Search, Filter, Pagination, Sorting, Export
description: Verify the reusable data table features work correctly across modules including searching, filtering, pagination, sorting, and export.

steps.description: Open a data table in beneficiary or donations list view
Perform text search on multiple fields
Verify results match search criteria
Apply multiple filter criteria
Verify filtered results are correct
Sort columns ascending and descending
Verify sorting order is correct
Navigate between pages using pagination
Verify correct page data is displayed
Export current view to CSV, Excel, and PDF
Verify export files are properly formatted and complete

title: Security: CSRF Token Validation and API Rate Limiting
description: Verify that CSRF token validation is enforced on API endpoints and rate limiting restricts excessive API calls.

steps.description: Perform API requests with valid CSRF token
Verify requests succeed without CSRF errors
Perform API requests with missing or invalid CSRF token
Verify requests are rejected with CSRF error
Perform rapid repeated API requests exceeding limit
Verify requests are throttled or blocked according to rate limit policy

title: Error Handling: User-Friendly Error Messages and Sentry Logging
description: Verify that errors are caught, user-friendly error boundaries are shown, and exceptions are logged to Sentry.

steps.description: Induce an error by submitting malformed data or performing invalid operations
Verify user sees friendly error message without technical details
Verify error is logged to Sentry backend

title: Performance: Verify Core Web Vitals and Bundle Size
description: Verify that performance metrics meet targets: FCP <1.5s, LCP <2.5s, CLS <0.1, TTI <3s and bundle size is under 400KB.

steps.description: Load main application pages using performance monitoring tools
Verify that First Contentful Paint occurs under 1.5 seconds
Verify Largest Contentful Paint occurs under 2.5 seconds
Verify Cumulative Layout Shift stays below 0.1
Verify Time to Interactive is under 3 seconds
Measure JavaScript bundle size
Verify bundle size is under 400KB

title: Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance Across UI Components and Pages
description: Verify accessibility compliance including keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, contrast ratios, and screen reader support.

steps.description: Navigate through key UI components and pages using keyboard only
Verify all interactive elements are accessible and focusable
Use accessibility testing tools to scan pages
Verify all ARIA roles and properties are implemented correctly
Verify color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
Test with screen reader to verify correct reading order and labeling
